attributes.additional_details: stop this stupid ballooning aid budget  to countries like india and china and corrupt regimes which are growing ten times faster than we are . and spending the money on defence and space programs.while we are cutting our defence budget, and could not muster a single warship to defend our own shores ,during the libya debacle.we have starving children in this country too...but this govt. chooses to ignore that .they also ignore that we the voters will not forget what they are doing in our name.
